mapper.select: SELECT l.cgSeq, l.cgName from codeGroup as l where 1=1
SELECT cdSeq, cdName, codeGroup_cgSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND cdDelNy = 0

SELECT c.codeGroup_cgSeq, c.cdUse, cg.cgName, c.cdSeq, c.cdName, c.cdNameEng, c.cdOrder, c.cdRegDate, c.cdEdDate, c.cdCheck, c.cdDelNy from code c left JOIN codegroup cg ON c.codeGroup_cgSeq = cg.cgSeq where 1=1 AND c.cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
mapper.update: update code set cdUse = #{cdUse}, cdName = #{cdName}, cdNameEng = #{cdNameEng}, cdOrder = #{cdOrder}, codeGroup_cgSeq = #{codeGroup_cgSeq}, cdEdDate = now() where cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
